title: Latin American Herald Tribune - Pope Francis Urges Prisoner Rehabilitation in U.S.
content:
PHILADELPHIA When Pope Francis spoke of rehabilitation on Sunday in Curran-Fromhold Correctional Facility, a prison in Philadelphia, he did so in Spanish, but most inmates living within the hard walls of the prison failed to understand him not so much for the language but because the U.S. criminal justice system revolves around punishment and imprisonment of the guilty in isolated areas.They dont give us a second chance, they dont work hard for it.
